translations: v.授予，赋予；商讨，交换意见

sentences.sentence: He wanted to confer with his colleagues before reaching a decision.
sentences.translation: 他想与他的同事先商议一下再作出决定。

sentences.sentence: I will now confer a benefit on him.
As any geriatric ward shows, that is not the same as to confer enduring mobility, awareness and autonomy.
sentences.translation: 正如任何老年病房所显示的那样，这与赋予病人持久的行动、意识和自主权是不一样的。
